response.overview: Delusions of Grandy is an intimate portrait of a man seen through the eyes of those who know him best. Created in celebration of his 30th birthday, this film weaves together stories and memories. This mosaic of voices captures the humor, heart, and quiet impact of an amazing man.
response.tagline: A portrait of a man on his 30th birthday, painted by his nearest and dearest.
response.title: Delusions of Grandy
